document.full_text: irwin d. simon, chief of the hain celestial group, says that treating people right will make them want to be a part of your team.
document.title: corner office: all are welcome at his meetings. (that means interns, too.)
lines_and_colors: irwin d. simon, chief of the hain celestial group, says that treating people right will make them want to be a part of your team.
